channel.title: Super Bowl on Javier's Data Site
channel.description: Recent content in Super Bowl on Javier's Data Site

item.title: Speaking Event (Super Bowl Predictive Modeling)
item.description: Two weeks ago, I knew nothing about the NFL (despite my passion for fútbol!). I teamed up with my classmate and knowledgeable NFL fan, Kaitlyn Drake, and developed a model and game simulation via R to predict the Super Bowl winner and final scores. We predicted the Rams winning 15-14… it’ll be a close game. We relied on Poisson regression, game simulation, and C4.5 / J48 decision tree to derive our results.
